name: Technical - Backend
description: Template for backend developers focusing on APIs, databases, server infrastructure, and system architecture.

capturePrompts.label: System Context
capturePrompts.prompt: What system or service is this about?
capturePrompts.placeholder: e.g., User auth service, Payment API, Database migration

capturePrompts.label: Technical Details
capturePrompts.placeholder: e.g., REST endpoint, SQL query, Redis cache strategy

capturePrompts.label: Code References
capturePrompts.prompt: What files, functions, or endpoints are relevant?

capturePrompts.label: Performance & Scaling
capturePrompts.placeholder: e.g., N+1 query issue, Need caching, Rate limiting required

capturePrompts.label: Dependencies
capturePrompts.prompt: What does this depend on or block?
capturePrompts.placeholder: e.g., Needs DB schema first, Blocks frontend integration

llmSystemPrompt: You are assisting a Backend Developer. Focus on server-side architecture, API design, database operations, and system reliability. Identify technical debt, performance issues, and implementation tasks. Be specific about code changes and system dependencies.
